<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085921</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Writing workshops with Microsoft Word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben Werkstätten mit Microsoft Word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ateliers d'écriture avec Microsoft Word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oficinas da escrita com palavra de Microsoft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gruppi di lavoro di scrittura con la parola del 
Microsoft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψιμο των εργαστηρίων με Microsoft Word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Talleres de la escritura con Microsoft Word</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Microsoft Word's reviewing functions enhance communication as students revise drafts of their writing projects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Microsoft Word, das Funktionen wiederholt, erhöhen 
Kommunikation, während Kursteilnehmer Entwürfe ihrer Schreiben 
Projekte verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les fonctions passantes en revue de Microsoft Word 
mettent en valeur la transmission pendant que les étudiants mettent 
à jour des ébauches de leurs projets d'écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As funções revendo da palavra de Microsoft 
realçam uma comunicação enquanto os estudantes revisam esboços de 
seus projetos da escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le funzioni di riesaminazione della parola del 
Microsoft aumentano la comunicazione mentre gli allievi modificano le 
brutte copie dei loro progetti di scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι λειτουργίες αναθεώρησης Microsoft Word 
ενισχύουν την επικοινωνία δεδομένου ότι οι σπουδαστές αναθεωρούν
τα σχέδια των προγραμμάτων γραψίματός τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Microsoft Word que repasa funciones realza la 
comunicación mientras que los estudiantes revisan los bosquejos de 
sus proyectos de la escritura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
